en.content: A shadow falls across you. “So,” May Ledbetter says. “You know.”
You try to get to your feet. A mob of villagers spills from behind her and surrounds you. You struggle, but you cannot resist the sheer weight of their numbers. You are quickly overpowered.

zh.content: 忽然一片阴影笼罩了你。“那么，”梅·莱德贝特说，“你知道了。”
你试图站起身。但一大群村民从她身后蜂拥而出，瞬间围住了你。你奋力挣扎，但他们的人数占绝对优势，你无从抵抗。很快你就被制服了。
